channel.title: Mass clicking
channel.description: ok i think i found a way to stop mass clickers.... everytime u click on any of my training dumyms\hay\doors..... ull get an automatic connection lsot...... taks 5 seconds 2 get back on and ull still have the lvl u got from atting em...... i am deciding wether or not to keep it though

item.title: Mass clicking

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yeah… I’m pretty sure that you will lose a lot of people due to this… I don’t think that people will want to lose connection everytime they want to train…
